articles.title: Capitals take series lead after filling scoresheet in Game Three: numbers for the morning after - Russian Machine Never Breaks
articles.description: The Washington Capitals pounced all over the Panthers in Game Three and walked away 6-1 blowout victors. The Caps are now up 2-1 in the series with another game to come in DC before they head back to Florida. Well,...
